title: Connecting Networks in Global Maker Movements: the Africa Europe Maker Innovation Ecosystem
abstract: We're creating a network of maker networks – very meta indeed. Through this we want to leverage the potential of open hardware for digital innovation, skill building and job creation.
description:
The participating networks all support spaces and makers in Africa and Europe, through them we want to promote Open Hardware and the Internet of Production.

mAkE is a trans-disciplinary approach to connect European and African Digital Innovation Hubs, EU funded through the Horizon 2020 programme.

persons.biography: Berlin based political consultant and activist. Board member of the Global Innovation Gathering e.V., a global network of social and technological innovators.
